intro: Save the Species! Escape Earth Before the Meteor Strikes!
description:
A massive meteor is hurtling toward Earth—and it’s up to you to save as many species as possible!

About the Game
Load animals onto your ship and escape in this action-packed puzzle game!
But be warned—heavy animals will rock the boat and take up precious space.
You'll need to balance species, weight, and space while aiming to rescue as many paired males and females as you can to ensure the survival of each species.

How to Play
Timing your departure is absolutely crucial—you, the captain, decide when to departure!

Once you start loading animals, the countdown begins. The more animals you add, the less time you’ll have before the meteor hits. Push it to the limit and load as many as you can—but don’t wait too long!
No matter how full your ship is, it won’t matter if you don’t escape in time. Gauge the situation, pick the right moment, and launch to survive.

It’s Not Just About the Animals!
You’ll also need to pack essentials like food, supplies—and maybe even a few priceless treasures.
But be careful: overloading your ship or upsetting its balance could spell disaster.
Stack wisely, keep the ship steady, and make a swift getaway!

Game Modes
From quick and casual in Challenge Mode, to high-stakes Hard Mode with tons of animals and leaderboard rankings, to Survival Mode where one mistake means game over—you’ll find a mode for every kind of player.
Try them all and see how many lives you can save!
